name: iTalkuTalk: Watch video, AI speeching practice
description: iTalkuTalk is a language learning platform  1) No. 1 in the best app ranking 2) 9 languages for learning(English, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Western, German, French, Russian, Vietnamese) 3) more than 120 countries download 4) more than 2,000 native speakers videos 5) more than 20,000 online learners 6) more than 100,000 pronunciation correction practice sentences using artificial intelligence 7) Single sentence loop playback, highly effective listening training 8) online learning partner matching 9) double ten memory method, efficient recitation of words and sentences
